website_summaries.verdict: An affordable headset that is ideal for those who make a lot of calls each day.
pros: These headphones are very lightweight and comfortable to wear
The microphone features noise canceling, so the people you're talking to on the phone can hear you clearly
The boom arm has a flexible tip so you can adjust the microphone placement
Cable that connects to the computer is long, so you  have more space to move while wearing
cons: The sound quality is fine for calls, but not great for listening to music

customer_reviews.title: The dedicated mic which is easy to move up and down helps tons
customer_reviews.text: Having suffered through Lync calls using a iPhone headset for years and having to hold the mic to my face perfectly and still hear complaints from the other end, this headset is a vast improvement. The dedicated mic which is easy to move up and down helps tons, and a digital interface (via USB) allows the software to do its job and remove background noises. I have not had one complaint from users on the other end of calls, and I hear them perfect. They are also super light and comfortable and you can wear them all day without pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Good option for SFB/Lync or other UC clients.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Lync / SFB (Skype for Business) headset... Excellent audio and voice quality for calls. The headset is confortable even for long periods usage. I have a big head and it feets well. Corded is the best way when you need quality. It has control over volume, mute, answer/hangup on a little box attached to the cable in a convenient position. On the not so good side, I feel the headset is a little fragile but if you are careful you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Super easy plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice on Lync/Skype for Business. Super easy plug and play. No problems at all. I can not normally wear headphones (on-ear or in-ear) due to a medical condition. But I needed a headset for a business call, and this is the set that was recommended. My calls were relatively short, but I still want to say that I found the headset very comfortable and it did not trigger any nerve pain. It sits very lightly on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tremko - Author of The DIY Spa Retreat

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Highly directional mic (so doesn't pick up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Highly directional mic (so doesn't pick up background noise, or even much of your voice if you put it in upright position). I only dock a star for the band fitting a bit too loosely in my opinion (which admittedly some may find a positive, not a negative- YMMV).
customer_reviews.author: RJ B.

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Skype for Business, Great for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office, I work from home and am on conference calls for a large part of my day. All I did was plug in this headset and it worked immediately with Skype for Business. The only minor adjustment I had to make was to move the speaker off to the side (my coworkers were telling me that they could hear me breathing). Call quality has been great. I've had the wireless version of this headset and I like this one better because it has earphones on both sides which blocks out background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset for Skype
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset for Skype. Been struggling for years to find a decent pair of headphones that works on my cell phone jack for cell calls, but also on my PC when I want to call people on Skype... This will ONLY work on a PC, but the sound on it is perfect. For some reason, headphone jack headphones don't work well on Skype, at least in my experiences with many of them (sounds like the phone is in your pocket). Probably a Skype program or driver issue..... These however are great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: James PH

customer_reviews.title: It works a large majority of time, I guess I was hoping for 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: The head set works fine most of the time. I have had it for about 7 months and use it most days for work. The wires attached to the head set started to fray about 3 weeks ago. I had to use electrical tape to keep the wires in place. What a pain in the rump. There are times when the unit does not work for a moment until I giggle the wires :( OK it was $40 - but I should last longer than 6 months. Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark from Denver

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Affordable - Reliable
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these because my work involves lots of VoIP calls that I have to take care of while being at home. The sound is crystal clear and the noise reduction is DEFINITELY worth it (My pets bark every now and then but the noise reduction really gets the job done). The headsets feel really comfortable due to being really lightweight and well cushioned. So if you are looking a high quality headset at an affordable price, this is definitely worth the shot!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Andre Mejia Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the volume.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a work from home job. I am on the phones all day they are pretty comfortable but I had an issue with hearing the customers talking to me and I had all volume levels maxed out on the computer and on the headset itself and on the computer audio mixer and I still could not hear the customers very well so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This had been working well for a few days... I put it in my bag and had been pulling it out (not that forcefully I thought), when the wire broke at a joint. I told them about it and they replaced it immediately. Right back to using Dragon, where it has been giving very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Dave

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else unless you want to sound like Darth Vader
customer_reviews.text: The mic picks up the slightest breath noise from mouth or nose. I have to keep muting myself just to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Good audio and microphone. The other party can hear me without background noise/hiss. I've asked he other party on the line, they are not noticing friction noise caused by motion. The chord length gives me ample space for moving around. I had a problem with one out of two laptops not recognizing the device. At least in my case, this was not because of the device. I was able to fix that by tweaking security settings on the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: I use skype for language teaching on average 5-6 hours per day. The mic (which is most important for me) is superior to my lx 3000. However, the headphones are too small so it will be uncomfortable. For podcasting I use the Blue Yeti which is a superior mic. So I end up not using the Jabra (using the lx3000 instead). That being said - it is a very good headset but I will continue to search for another.
customer_reviews.author: Magne

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Windows 10. It is very light and comfortable. Both speakers and microphone sound good. If treated well it should last a while. Ear pads are always first to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Shrock

customer_reviews.title: Good but not comfortable and messes with computer sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good but they hurt my ears after an hour or so. Also, using them always mutes my computer so after every time I use them I have to turn my computer volume back up. And I CNT use my keyboard controls to adjust the sound, only the attachment in the wire it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: MonicaSD

customer_reviews.title: TRANSMITS ALL NOISES!!! NOT "Noise Canceling Microphone" as advertised
customer_reviews.text: EVERYONE can hear EVERYTHING in the background. I have no trouble hearing the other party, but they hear even the slightest noises in the background, even ones from across the room - CLEAR AS A BELL.
customer_reviews.author: GermanByMarriage

customer_reviews.title: Decent Overall
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality overall. Super easy to use and no issues with compatibility with Lync 2010/2013, Avaya one-X Communicator or WebEx. My only complaint (as others have noted) is that at times it feels like it could use a bit more compression to provide a tighter fit to my ears. For the price and compatibility, however, it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset. I bought this headset for my wife to use for work because originally I purchased the 150 MS which only had one earphone, I purchased these because the 150 MS work great. This set also has 2 earphones. They work great. Are nice and light and the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Romanelli

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This headset is comfortable and sounds fantastic. It also helps block out background noise, which is helpful for those of us who work from home or in an noisy office setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Noceda

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and easy on the head and ears
customer_reviews.text: We just got VOIP phones at work and needed a headset. I tried 4 others before landing on this one. It is well made, sounds good and most important for me light on the head/ears.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sepe

customer_reviews.title: Voice quality is superb!
customer_reviews.text: The overall voice quality is better than the other normal headset! I asked all my colleagues that i talked to using this headset and they all agree that the voice quality was superb!
customer_reviews.author: erwi1n_p

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good price, noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable headset. My wife has Jabra Voice 150. I prefer 550 because it has leatherette ear cushions instead of 150 which is made of foam. Noise cancellation is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Best headset to use with Lync and Skype
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. My cat chewed through the cable of my last one, so I had to buy another. Crisp clear sound both directions.
customer_reviews.author: Xena_Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses this for interactive online classes in her graduate program. Very comfortable and great audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use at work and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: humphrid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought one for every member of my team.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long enough.
customer_reviews.text: Headset quit working after about a year. Message: "Headset not plugged in."
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headset. Works very well with Skype for Business. Underside of the headband is comfortable. No complaints on the microphone picking up my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Senior Chief Petty Officer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality....Service Support?
customer_reviews.text: Mic stops working after 5 months of use, but I found returns or support is no longer available. Anything I can do to change my heart about the company or the product?
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not THAT plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I had to search a little bit on the internet to find out how to make it work on corporate computers - which generally don't let you install any software like Jabra Direct. After manually setting up both windows and Cisco IP communicator, the headset works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos T. Morita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset for Skype for Business great sound and clarity
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my staff and they are excellent! They are noise canceling and you can hear everybody with extreme clarity!
customer_reviews.author: Dijuana Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound, lightweight, strong, lengthy cord. comfortable for 8 hrs of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hearset! It's so comfortable, you hardly know there on... Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: noise cancellation is great but you can only use if for 2-3 hours because the adapter is heating
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset .. loved it .. and then it stopped working a week after the return policy expired. Sucks! Wish the seller could resend a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Faaiza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great got here on time just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: M. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Comfortable, and they do the job I need.
customer_reviews.author: Erikka

customer_reviews.title: Audio ok but fit is a little less than expected
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality is as I expected but I was a little disappointed in the diameter of the ear pieces. If the specs gave a diameter, I didnt catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headset i have owned. Very clear and comfortable to wear. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bbrmly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use and worked very well on first try.
customer_reviews.author: rick zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and comfy fit. Wouldn't use for music, but that's not what they're intended for anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: may buy another pair so i have at home and office
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what you get but it works ! and thats the important thing. I couldnt get my lync phone to work with the headset I had. I bought 2 of them. One for home and one for work. I agree with the other person that you get the friction noise from the chord and that shouldnt be. As long as you dont play with the chord its not a problem. The microphone and audio are good for phone use and listening to music
customer_reviews.author: david hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good and it fits my head well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when I work from home and have meetings. I use it with Microsoft Lync, and I've had no issues. Sound quality is good and it fits my head well, although it does move quite a bit since it's pretty loose. It doesn't bug me much, since I prefer that over really tight headphones. Cord length is great (pretty long). My only issue is that the ear pads are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I have a wide head, but this headset leaves a lot of space up top (its oval-shaped as you can see in the picture). This causes it to rotate and slide around fairly often. Also the mic extends in front of the mouth/under the nose which at first doesnt seem like a big deal until you have all your customers ask why you are breathing into the microphone. The mic arm looks like it would be bendable but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Murray

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I purchased but this one was for a co-worker. I sang it's praises and she wanted me to purchase one for her. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They break within a month of use front he comes getting wrapped up.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD... THIS BRAND WON'T LET YOU DOWN! TWO THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.author: Seymour

product_meta.title: Jabra UC VOICE 550 MS Duo Lync Optimized Corded Headset for Softphone
product_meta.description: The Jabra UC Voice 550 is a full-featured stereo headset ideal for professional users who need comfort and reliability. Padded headbands, wideband sound, and noise cancelling microphones deliver professional grade performance. Optimized for Microsoft Lync.
feature_bullets: HD Voice - High quality audio for crystal clear conversations Enjoy high-definition sound with HD Voice and get crystal clear, intelligible communication
Peak Stop - Peak Stop technology immediately removes potentially harmful loud sounds or tones before they reach your ears and keeps the sound level within the safe range to protect your hearing
UC Plug-And-Play - Jabra devices feature intuitive call control and seamless connection to all leading UC applications and softphones.
Noise Canceling Microphone reduces unwanted background noise and the noise-canceling microphones reduce unwanted background noise and are ideal in crowded and noisy, open office environments.
Flexible boom arm tip for optimal positioning - The Jabra UC Voice 550 headset has a flexible boom tip arm to ensure the ideal microphone placement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
